attributes.action: 1st hour of supermarkets only for elderly/people with vulnerable immune systems
attributes.additional_details: To help prevent the most vulnerable from getting COVID-19
attributes.background:
Supermarkets should dedicate the first hour of opening to the elderly and people with vulnerable immune systems. 

Start the day with newly sanitised trolley handles, doors, tills, fully stocked shelves and no panic.

rejection.details:
You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
